sentences.english: When people sleep on their front, their lower jaw is positioned further forward than normal.
sentences.chinese: 因为当人们俯卧的时候，下颚会比平时更加突出。

sentences.english: The boom operator still lays face-down in the center of the aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 飞杆操作员依然是脸朝下俯卧在机身中间。

sentences.english: Try push-ups, abdominal crunches and leg squats.
sentences.chinese: 试试俯卧撑，仰卧起坐和下蹲起立。

sentences.english: Go outside and take a walk. Maybe do some push-ups.
sentences.chinese: 出去散散步，或者做几个俯卧撑。

sentences.english: Turn the patient over onto his front.
sentences.chinese: 把病人翻过去让他俯卧。

sentences.english: My pelvis would hurt at night when I slept on my stomach.
sentences.chinese: 我夜里睡觉的时候如果俯卧的话，骨盆就会痛。

sentences.english: Don’t do all variations of pushups, for example.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，不要只做各种各样的俯卧撑。

sentences.english: Group A-push ups, free falls, leg circles and cuts.
sentences.chinese: 组俯卧撑，自由倒地，旋腿与分切。

sentences.english: Lie flat on your stomach with the ball between your ankles.
This drill Starts With swimmers in a prone position, With the hands extended in front, right hand over left.
sentences.chinese: 练习开始时运动员俯卧，双臂前伸，右手在左手背上。

sentences.english: Record the number of push-ups you complete in your notebook or journal.
sentences.chinese: 在你的笔记本和日记中记录俯卧撑的次数。

sentences.english: B: Well, I love to do push-ups, and I go cycling every day.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢做俯卧撑，每天我都骑单车。
做三组每组五个俯卧撑。

sentences.english: In the prone position, turn your pelvis to the right and then to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在俯卧姿势，将骨盆转到右边然后再到左边。

sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill; a tearful entreiny of love in the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖泊俯卧于山麓，泪水涟涟地向坚拒者示爱。

sentences.english: I can keep doing push-up for one hundred times everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我能每天坚持做俯卧撑一次，每次一口气100个。

definition: to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
